articles.content: Update:Developer Housemarque has released Patch 1.3.4 for Returnal. Aside from a few additional small fixes, it essentially remains the same as the 1.3.1 build. Though a 1.3.5 build is already in the… [+1720 chars]

articles.title: 'Animal Crossing' and 'StarCraft' join the Video Game Hall of Fame - Engadget
articles.description: After narrowing down a list of 12 finalists, The Strong National Museum of Play has inducted four new titles to its World Video Game Hall of Fame..
articles.content: And then there were four. After narrowing down a list of 12 finalists, The Strong National Museum of Play has inducted four new titles to its World Video Game Hall of Fame. In order of release, they … [+840 chars]

articles.title: Watch Ferrari's New 812 Competizione Melt Tires and Get Sideways at 9500 RPM - RoadandTrack.com
articles.description: This car is shaping up to be one of Ferrari's best.
articles.content: On Wednesday Ferrari revealed its newest V-12 supercar, the 812 Competizione. It's a limited-edition variant of the already great 812 Superfast built to conquer racetracks, packing an 819-hp naturall… [+1403 chars]
